title: I made an amigurumeep
body:
https://i.imgur.com/4XR1Edo.jpg

https://i.imgur.com/GDTVbPI.jpg

First attempt, but I like it so far. Based on my observations this go round I'm probably going to make the future meeps on a larger scale to preserve detail, as well as give me some more control over the proportions of the head and body.

And instead of embroidering the white part of the eyes I'm probably going to crochet a diamond-shaped patch, and embroider it on while doing the red embellishments.

BUT IT'S SO CUTE AND I MADE IT THIS IS WEIRD.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot swimbananas,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oE8zEu4O,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-04-12T02:24:37.586+0000)
>
> So cute!!!!!!

OMG A RIOTER POSTED ON MY THING {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

https://i.imgur.com/rzIU5jt.png

It seems sad being alone... better collect 10 chimes ASAP!

Edit: Why doesn't the image load v.v

> [{quoted}](name=Altiverse,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oE8zEu4O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-11T19:52:07.042+0000)
>
> https://i.imgur.com/rzIU5jt.png
> 
> It seems sad being alone... better collect 10 chimes ASAP!
> 
> Edit: Why doesn't the image load v.v

I don't know Q.Q

I'm already planning on making a bunch and possibly bringing them to Etsy.

THEY'RE SO MUCH FUN TO MAKE
Kinda random but, I can't see this image without clicking on it. Most boards images aren't loading for me, is this a bug or just me?
I love those so much, they're very cool!

Thanks guys so much for the kind comments! I'll be sure to post more as I improve, for sure!

My husband also tossed the idea of making little cosplay-meeps of different champions once I get the base model down. So there will be more!
